Curvature Property¶

class CurvatureProperty.CurvatureProperty(points, curvature)[source]¶

classdocs

Attributes

Curvature Points’ curvature values
Points Holds the points dataset
Raster Holds raster dataset
Shape_Index
Size Return the size of the property
curvadness Curvadness property defined by
gaussian_curvature Gaussian curvature
k1 Maximal principal curvature value
k2 Minimal principal curvature value
mean_curvature Mean curvature values

Methods

getValues()
return: mean curvature (temoprary)
save(filename, **kwargs) Save the property in either json or hdf5.
setValues(*args, **kwargs) Sets curvature into Curvature Property object
similarity_curvature() calculates similarity curvature (E,H)
Curvature¶

Points’ curvature values

Shape_Index¶
curvadness¶

Curvadness property defined by

\[\kappa_{curvadness}=\sqrt{\frac{\lambda_\max ^2 + \lambda_\min ^2}{2}}\]
gaussian_curvature¶

Gaussian curvature

Computed by

\[\kappa_{Gaussian}=\lambda_{\max} \cdot \lambda_{\min}\]
getValues()[source]¶
Returns: mean curvature (temoprary)
k1¶

Maximal principal curvature value

k2¶

Minimal principal curvature value

mean_curvature¶

Mean curvature values

setValues(*args, **kwargs)[source]¶

Sets curvature into Curvature Property object

Parameters: curvature –
similarity_curvature()[source]¶

calculates similarity curvature (E,H)

Parameters: k1,k2 – principal curvatures (k1>k2)
Return similarCurv:
  values of similarity curvature (E,H)
Return rgb: RGB color for every point
